snippet.title: Neon Odyssey - Official Multiplayer and Level Editor Reveal Trailer | Upload VR Showcase Winter 2023
snippet.description: Neon Odyssey is an action puzzle VR game developed by Ayayu Games. Players will solve complex mazes, interact with intense arcade action, and rescue Dr. Harris aboard an AI controlled space station. The trailer also announcees that a level editor and multiplayer functionality are coming to Neon Odyssey at a later date. Neon Odyssey is available now for Meta Quest 1, Meta Quest 2, Meta Quest 3, Meta Quest Pro, and PICO 4.
